Candidate :  Carole Akl  
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
  
Location:   UAE - Dubai  
 
 
EDUCATION  
 
BA (2006) - Bachelor of Arts ‘Advertising and Ma rketing’ from Notre Dame University - Lebanon  
Certificate in Global and Gas Industry Management (2013) - Strategy and Finance from Thunderbird 
University in Arizona, USA  
 
 
CARE ER SUMMARY  
 
2012 – date Petrofac International Limited   
Position: Senior Corporate Communications and Marketing Specialist   
Corporate Communication focus:  
• Act as the trusted advisor and go -to focal contact on communication processes and 
developments for the internal stakeholders  
• Lead on the corporate communication a genda proactively with internal and external 
stakeholders along with the news and press  
• Hands on in leading reactively to any press and news  
• Execute and lead internal campaigns targeting brand or employee change  
• Strategies communication plans with va rious departments to create content as needed to be 
used internally and externally digitally and print  
• Manage the communication message and tone of voice for business units heads to ensure 
alignment, and integrated messaging on designated thought leaders hip campaigns  
• Establish content used by the Business Development team to be used with clients  
• Manage and update content changes on the main website and internal hubs  
 
Marketing focus:  
• Successfully plan and manage Middle East, CIS, Asia Pacific, and Africa calendar of events 
such as ADIPEC with an eye on ROI; create content as needed, manage vendors and 
contractors to ensure a 360 brand compliance in exhibitions and sponsorships  
• Execute and lead targeted external campaigns in various countries based  on the market reports 
using various mediums as needed print, digital and offline to impact brand perception  
• Create, maintain and conduct analytics reporting across multiple platforms and exact key 
insights for future campaign development and go to marke t strategies  
• Manage various events from A to Z: graduation ceremony, town halls, HSE events, etc.  
• Plan and organize webinars to specific territories or service lines as needed. Develop the event 
and its best practices; organize, attend, and moderate  
 
 Strategy focus:  
• Develop winning communication plans regarding clients to lean on for the executive team  
• Manage territories of interest to plan marketing and communication approach such as new 
markets of interest: strategic country briefs and trends  
• Handle client communication to ensure excellent communication flow that directly impacts 
Petrofac’s international reputation and sales support medium such as: quarterly corporate 
presentations  
 
2009 – 2011 Staffo rd Associate s 
Position: Higher Education - Program Manager  
• Managed territories in Le banon, Jordan, Syria and KSA for University of Wales and Edexcel 
Bachelor and MBA programs  
• Managed marketing, communications, and sales of student recruitment activities  
• Identified through market analysis target groups for each program separately and p lanned 
accordingly a suitable marketing plan e.g., online MBA for working professionals through 
morning radio programs, newspapers, Google, Facebook, and mass mailing  
• Worked with local and regional media agencies and media buyers for the execution and 
implementation of advertising and marketing plans such us British Council, continuing education 
centers, Ministry of Education and Higher education  
• Conducted counselling meetings including one -on-one meetings with potential students to 
advice on best progr ams based on their needs  
• Worked with curriculum design teams to develop blended classroom sessions through virtual 
and eLearning facilities  
 
2007 – 2009 World Pr esentation  
Position : Business and Marketing Planner  
• Prepared business plans including marketing and advertising best practices for various projects  
• Market research and analysis for current trends with regards to different products in the needed 
demographics  
• Maintained projects’ websites content, press releases, brochures, and marketing collateral  
 
 
COMMENT  
 
Experienced and professional senior corporate

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
